commit.message:
re PR middle-end/21282 (Converting floor into lfloor built-in function)

	PR middle-end/21282
	* convert.c (convert_to_integer): Convert ceil and floor in
	c99 mode only.

testsuite:

	PR middle-end/21282
	* gcc.dg/pr21282.c: New.
